* May 2nd : Ubuntu Party in Vire.

* May 5th : <nowiki>[[http://premier-samedi.org/infos/mai-2012/|premier samedi du libre]]</nowiki> (PSL) in Paris. This is a multi-distribution small install fest where around 60 people come to get help configuring and installing their Linux system.

* May 9th : <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu-dijon.org/|soirée du libre]]</nowiki> spéciale Ubuntu 12.04 in Dijon.

* May 12th and 13th : <nowiki>[[http://ubuntu-paris.org/|Ubuntu Party]]</nowiki> (warning : the link will soon be outdated) in Paris. Conferences, workshops, classes, demonstrations, installs. ≈ 120 benevolents, 2 000 visitors, report being written.

* May 12th : <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu-dijon.org/linstall-party-dubuntu-dijon/|Install Party]]</nowiki> in Dijon.

* May 12th : Ubuntu Party in Saint-Seurin-sur-l’Isle.

* May 20th : <nowiki>[[http://forum.ubuntu-fr.org/viewtopic.php?pid=9313901#p9313901|Ubuntu Hour]]</nowiki> in Paris. Organized in the local gracioulsy lent by LQDN, we were around 10 people. Theme : Chinese food.

* May 25th, 26th and 27th : <nowiki>[[http://www.papillonsdenuit.com/|Papillons de nuit]]</nowiki> (P2N) music festival in Saint-Laurent-de-Cuves. The Papillons de nuit invited us for the second time to hold a webcafe on Ubuntu for the festival-goers. We didn't put any restriction, neither on which website were accessible, neither on Ubuntu, as we wanted people to discover it.

* May 29th : <nowiki>[[http://desclicks.net/2011/12/installs-party-desclicks/|Install Party Ubuntu]]</nowiki> in Schilitgheim.

* May 31th : <nowiki>[[http://www.agendadulibre.org/showevent.php?id=6930|Ubuntu Party]]</nowiki> in Aix-en-Provence.
